definition: A term commonly employed to refer to the physical structure or form of a living being, typically used to describe the human body or the body of an animal. It encompasses the entirety of the physical entity, including the head, limbs, and torso. This word is frequently utilized in various contexts, such as anatomy, biology, medicine, and physical education.

examples.german: Der Körper ist aus vielen verschiedenen Teilen zusammengesetzt.
examples.english: The body is composed of many different parts.

examples.german: Sie hat einen schlanken Körper und lange Beine.
examples.english: She has a slim body and long legs.

examples.german: Nach dem Unfall hatte er starke Schmerzen im ganzen Körper.
examples.english: After the accident, he had severe pain in his entire body.

examples.german: Der Körper benötigt ausreichend Schlaf, um sich zu erholen.
examples.english: The body needs sufficient sleep to recover.

examples.german: Yoga kann helfen, den Körper zu entspannen und den Geist zu beruhigen.
examples.english: Yoga can help relax the body and calm the mind.
